Makefile.lib: Use trap to avoid leaking .d.$$ files.

diff --git a/Makefile.lib b/Makefile.lib

 MAKEVARS := .makevars
 
 .%.d: %.cc $(MAKEVARS)/CXX $(MAKEVARS)/CPPFLAGS $(MAKEVARS)/CXXFLAGS
-	@set -e; rm -f $@; \
+	@set -e; trap 'rm -f $@.$$$$' EXIT; rm -f $@; \
 	 $(CXX) -M $(CPPFLAGS) $(CXXFLAGS) $< > $@.$$$$; \

+	 sed 's,\($(notdir $*)\)\.o[ :]*,$*.o $@ : ,g' < $@.$$$$ > $@

-	@set -e; rm -f $@; \
